description:
Features
 - RING X Platform aims to create a block-chain-based mileage integrated ecosystem by integrating various mileage service into block-chain technology and establishing an innovative platform for customers to purchase and consume high qualified contents with integrated mileage based on cooperation with various mileage service providers.

RING X project's protocol is based on Ethereum(ERC-20).

   1) RINGX Token is a token for enabling RINGX Service Platform.
   2) RINGX Token can be used for marketing and promotion of service providers. (Bounty Program)
   3) RINGX Token can be swapped with external Third-party platform tokens.
   4) RINGX Token can be exchanged for RINGX Loyalty Point in RINGX Platform.
name: RING X PLATFORM
